text:
The Joint Electricity Regulatory Commission (JERC) will conduct a public hearing on multi-year tariffs for the period 2016-19 on January 28.

The JERC for the State of Goa UTs will discuss multi-year tariff and annual revenue requirement for the same period, a press note from the Superintending Engineer-I of the Puducherry Electricity Department said.

The event is slated to start at 9.30 a.m. at 81, Laporte Street, PMSSS Hall, Puducherry.
title: Public hearing
